普通药物含有隐藏的面筋和大豆，研究发现一项葡萄牙的研究发现，超过一半的基于扑热息痛的止痛药和四分之一的布洛芬液体含有麸质或大豆衍生的摄取因素，为过敏敏感的个体带来了风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/common-medicines-contain-contain-hidden-gluten-and-and-soy-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/common-medicines-contain-contain-hidded-gluten-and-gluten-and-soy-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AE8AE805-3188-4131-9C13-94D972A984EB Tue, 01 Apr 2025 21:22:00 -0400 Common medicines contain hidden gluten and soy, study finds
稀有糖遏制食欲和模仿糖尿病药物罕见的糖，如D-歌服，D-诱因和D-碳糖，显着增强了GLP-1的分泌，并抑制了小鼠的食物摄入量。 D-甲基通过独特的，独立的GLP-1独立途径也降低了食物摄入量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/rare-sugars-curb-appetite-and-mimic-diabetes-mimic-diabetes-drugs-in-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/rare-sugars-curb-appetite-and-mimic-diabetes-mimic-diabetes-drugs-in-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb2170c9-​​1e84-47d3-b7b0-5de98229dbee Tue, 01 Apr 2025 20:35:00 -0400 Rare sugars curb appetite and mimic diabetes drugs in mice
只有13％的法国成年人具有最佳的心脏健康 - 在这里驱动差距的原因根据美国心脏协会生命的基本8（LE8）评分，只有13％的18-69岁法国成年人具有最佳心血管健康。这些发现突出了未预防的机会，并暗示适度的生活方式改变可以防止多达81％的心血管事件。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/only-1325-of-french-adults-have-optimal-healthe-healthe28094 heree28099S-WHATE28099S-WHATE2809S-WHATE 2809S-DRIVED-DRIVED-THE-GAP.-GAP.ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/only-1325-of-french-adults-have-have-optimal-healthe28094 heree28099S-Whate28099S-WHATE2809S-WHATE 2809S-DRIVED-DRIVED-THE-TE-TE-GAP.ASPX#COMMENT https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=24E3D8C9-2A0D-486D-BBBE-ECCE44D640C4 Tue, 01 Apr 2025 19:51:00 -0400 Only 13% of French adults have optimal heart health—here’s what’s driving the gap
研究发现，在社交媒体上享用视频归一化暴饮暴食和稀薄的理想研究人员在YouTube，Tiktok和Bilibili上分析了180个流行的饮食视频，以评估它们对身体形象和饮食行为的影响。他们经常发现瘦宿主暴饮暴食的描述，可能使不健康的习惯正常化并加强了不现实的身体理想。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/eating-videos-on-social-media-normalize-normize-normilize-overeating-and-thin-thin-win--in-win--in-win---------------------------------------thin-thin-thin-thin-thin-thin-thin-thin-thin-thin-diel-deals-study-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/eating-videos-on-social-media-normalize-normilize-normalize-overeating-and-thin-thin-win--in-win--in-wideals-in--------finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d6Ed89E-4F00-4620-959F-7CEB8AFD851 Tue, 01 Apr 2025 19:23:00 -0400 Eating videos on social media normalize overeating and thin ideals, study finds

AI驱动的研究旨在提高IVF成功率目前，通过IVF治疗的成功怀孕数量在全球范围内为30％至50％。通过使用AI分析诊所实验室的环境状况，马尔默大学的研究人员认为，他们可以提高成功结果的机会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/ai-driven-driven-research-aims-to-improve-improve-imvf-success-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/ai-driven-driven-research-aims-to-improve-improve-imvf-success-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc0ae583-4471-4197-BA88-E71DFC0215CB Tue, 01 Apr 2025 14:50:26 -0400 AI-driven research aims to improve IVF success rates

研究将儿童空气污染暴露到较弱的大脑连接由“ La Caixa”基金会支持的中心巴塞罗那全球卫生研究所（Isglobal）领导的一项新研究发现，在童年早期和童年时期暴露于空气污染水平较高的儿童之间，关键大脑区域之间的联系较弱。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/study-links-childhood-airhood-air-pollution-air-pollution-pobure-weaker-brain-brain-connections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/study-links-childhood-airhood-air-pollution-air-pollution-expobure-weaker-brain-brain-connections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c2bfb69-6583-4acf-9c34-634-634d4ef6f96d Tue, 01 Apr 2025 13:50:36 -0400 Study links childhood air pollution exposure to weaker brain connections
